name: Blind Bandit
description:
Play as a literally blind bandit and use echolocation to evade the police!

Use WASD or the left joystick to move

Use Mouse button 1 or A to activate echolocation

This is a game project made for "Global Game Jam 2021"
Blind Bandit is not a complete experience
but a playground to test out navigation using only echolocation


Thanks for playing!

A Game by Fredrik Ulvmoen

Music by Alex Espeseth

Voices by:

Frankenberry / Bruce Forte (https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCZFoMGwB0ozmn7c82LmhsPA)

Swilmann (https://www.twitch.tv/swilmann)
